title: Lalita Niwas Land Scam
description: Government land around Lalita Niwas was illegally transferred to private individuals through collusion with officials and politicians, involving forgery of documents and embezzlement of billions in land value.
officialInvolved: Bijay Kumar Gachhadar, Chandra Deo Joshi, Dambar Shrestha, Deep Basnyat, Chhabi Raj Pant, Madhav Kumar Nepal, Baburam Bhattarai

title: Fake Bhutanese Refugee Scam
description: Politicians and bureaucrats created fake Bhutanese refugee documents to traffic Nepali citizens to the US and other countries, extorting millions from victims.
officialInvolved: Bal Krishna Khand, Top Bahadur Rayamajhi, Tek Narayan Pandey, Indrajit Rai, Keshav Prasad Dulal

title: Wide-Body Aircraft Procurement Scandal
description: Corruption in the procurement of two Airbus A330-200 jets by Nepal Airlines, involving inflated costs, bribes, and financial mismanagement leading to billions in losses.
officialInvolved: Sugat Ratna Kansakar, Shankar Adhikari, Shishir Kumar Dhungana, Jeevan Bahadur Shahi, Rabindra Adhikari

title: Omni Group COVID Procurement Scandal
description: Overpriced procurement of health equipment during the Covid-19 pandemic, bypassing procedures and involving irregularities in contracts.
officialInvolved: Ishwar Pokharel, Bhanu Bhakta Dhakal, Yadav Koirala, Som Bahadur Thapa, Chudamani Sharma

title: Budhigandaki Hydropower Corruption
description: Alleged embezzlement and irregularities in the Budhigandaki Hydropower Project, involving kickbacks and mismanagement of funds.
officialInvolved: Baburam Bhattarai, KP Sharma Oli, Sher Bahadur Deuba, Pushpa Kamal Dahal

title: Gokul Baskota Bribe Scandal
description: Communications Minister Gokul Baskota allegedly demanded a bribe for a printing press deal, exposed through leaked audio recordings.
officialInvolved: Gokul Baskota, Bijaya Prakash Mishra, Navin Kumar Ghimire

title: Sudan APC Scam
description: Embezzlement in the procurement of armoured vehicles for UN peacekeeping mission in Sudan, involving substandard equipment and misappropriation of funds.
officialInvolved: Om Bikram Rana, Hem Bahadur Gurung, Ramesh Chand Thakuri, Shambhu Bharati, Michael Rider

title: 60kg Gold Smuggling Scandal
description: Large-scale gold smuggling operation involving concealment in electronic goods and motorcycle parts, with transnational links and political protection.
officialInvolved: Daoxin Wang, Krishna Bahadur Mahara, Rahul Mahara, Amala Rokka, Chandra Ghale

title: Ncell Tax Evasion Scandal
description: Tax evasion in the sale of Ncell shares involving offshore companies and underreporting of capital gains, leading to billions in unpaid taxes.
officialInvolved: Niraj Govinda Shrestha, Upendra Mahato, Bhawana Singh Shrestha, Satish Lal Acharya

title: Giribandhu Tea Estate Scandal
description: Illegal attempts to swap and sell protected tea estate land for commercial real estate development, involving collusion between estate owners, politicians, and land brokers, in violation of land reform laws.
officialInvolved: KP Sharma Oli, Pushpa Kamal Dahal, Rabi Lamichhane, Yogesh Bhattarai, Bishwa Prakash Sharma

title: Pokhara International Airport Corruption
description: Massive irregularities and embezzlement during the construction of the China-financed airport, including overpricing, substandard work, and safety flaws.
officialInvolved: Bureaucrats, politicians, Chinese company CAMCE representatives

title: Tax Settlement Commission Scandal
description: Officials illegally waived billions in taxes for businesses, causing massive revenue loss through improper settlements.
officialInvolved: Chudamani Sharma, Lumbadhoj Mahat, Umesh Dhakal

title: Nepal Oil Corporation Land Purchase Scam
description: Irregularities and embezzlement in purchasing land for petroleum storage facilities, with overpriced deals and misappropriation of funds.
officialInvolved: NOC Chief Gopal Bahadur Khadka, other NOC officials

title: Cooperatives Embezzlement Scandal
description: Widespread fraud in cooperative societies involving embezzlement of depositors' funds, leading to massive losses and public protests.
officialInvolved: Rabi Lamichhane, GB Rai, Rishikesh Pokharel, other cooperative officials

title: Patanjali Yogpeeth Land Scam
description: Former Prime Minister Madhav Kumar Nepal facilitated the illegal purchase and sale of land exceeding legal limits for Patanjali Yogpeeth Nepal, causing financial loss to the state through land swaps and sales at higher prices.
officialInvolved: Madhav Kumar Nepal, 92 others including former ministers and officials

title: Melamchi Water Supply Project Corruption
description: Irregularities in the Melamchi Drinking Water Project, including embezzlement, failure to recover funds from contractors, and corruption leading to convictions and recovery orders.
officialInvolved: Gajendra Thakur, Rudra Singh Tamang, Mani Bhadra Neupane, Begnath Paudel, Ramchandra Neupane, other officials and companies

title: IT Equipment Procurement Scandal
description: Embezzlement in the procurement of IT equipment, involving former executive director and others.
officialInvolved: Sunil Paudel and five others

title: Lauda Air Lease Scandal
description: Irregularities and corruption in the leasing of a Boeing 767 aircraft from Lauda Air for Royal Nepal Airlines Corporation (RNAC), causing significant financial loss to the state airline. The deal was made without a proper tender process and at inflated costs.
officialInvolved: Girija Prasad Koirala, Chakra Prasad Bastola, Hari Bhakta Shrestha, Tirtha Lal Shrestha

title: Armed Police Force Embezzlement Scandal (Kosh Raj Onta)
description: Former Inspector General of Armed Police Force, Kosh Raj Onta, and over 20 other officials were charged with embezzling millions by creating fake bills and vouchers for transporting goods and supplies to various APF units.
officialInvolved: Kosh Raj Onta, Shailendra Shrestha, Sudeep Thapa, Ram Kumar Basnet

title: Diplomatic Passport Misuse Scandal
description: Several Constituent Assembly members and officials were implicated in misusing their diplomatic 'red' passports to illegally send people abroad, often for financial gain. The scheme involved passing off unrelated individuals as part of official delegations.
officialInvolved: Dolma Tamang, Narayani Devi Pradhan, Bimala KC, Gayatri Shah, Shiva Pujan Ray Yadav

title: National Payment Gateway Scandal
description: Corruption in the procurement of the National Payment Gateway system, which was purchased for an exorbitant price without proper competitive bidding and was never brought into effective use, causing a significant loss to the state.
officialInvolved: Sunil Paudel, Sanjay Sharma, Ram Bahadur Budha, Safal Shrestha

title: 33kg Gold Smuggling & Sanam Shakya Murder Case
description: Authorities seized ~33.5kg of gold that passed undetected through TIA customs; the case later linked to the torture and murder of carrier Sanam Shakya. Multiple arrests, trials, and life sentences followed.
officialInvolved: Alleged mastermind Chudamani Upreti 'Gore' and associates

title: Fake VAT Bill/Refund Scam
description: Widespread creation and use of fake VAT invoices to claim refunds or evade taxes; DRI filed cases against networks issuing bogus VAT bills worth billions.
officialInvolved: Multiple business operators and intermediaries identified by DRI

title: Nepal Oil Corporation Land Purchase Irregularities
description: NOC purchased land for fuel depots at prices well above market, with parliamentary and CIAA probes citing misappropriation from hundreds of millions up to over a billion rupees.
officialInvolved: Senior NOC management and brokers (as probed by House panels/CIAA)

title: Nepal Airlines A330 Wide-Body Procurement Scandal
description: Parliamentary probes and CIAA cases alleged irregularities in the purchase of two Airbus A330s, including overvaluation and flawed process.
officialInvolved: Former NAC officials including then MD/CEO; suppliers/international intermediaries

title: Omni Group COVID-19 Procurement Controversy
description: Health Ministry’s fast-tracked deal with Omni for PPE/testing kits drew accusations of overpricing and favoritism; the contract was later scrapped.
officialInvolved: Health Ministry officials; Omni Group representatives

title: Security Printing Press Bribery Audio (Gokul Baskota)
description: Leaked audio purportedly captured Minister Gokul Baskota negotiating hefty kickbacks in a multi-billion-rupee security printing press deal; he resigned afterward.
officialInvolved: Gokul Prasad Baskota (then Minister of Communication and Information Technology)

title: Tax Settlement Commission Corruption Case
description: CIAA arrested then Tax Settlement Commission member-secretary Chudamani Sharma for alleged revenue leakage and irregular tax waivers via the commission.
officialInvolved: Chudamani Sharma; other commission members

title: Nepal Trust Land Lease to Yeti Holdings
description: The Nepal Trust leased prime public land to Yeti Holdings/affiliates for luxury hotels, drawing allegations of undervaluation, influence and conflict of interest.
officialInvolved: Nepal Trust officials; Yeti Holdings/Hyatt-related entities

title: Bansbari Leather & Shoe Factory Land Deal Controversy
description: After privatization, prime factory land was parceled out in questionable deals over years; probes alleged illegal transfers and undervaluation.
officialInvolved: Former officials and private buyers

title: Oriental Savings & Credit Cooperative Scam
description: Thousands of depositors alleged fraud after cooperative funds were diverted into real-estate projects; long-running case with arrests and court orders.
officialInvolved: Promoter Sudhir Basnet and associates

title: Suryadarshan Cooperative Fraud (Kathmandu)
description: Savings and credit cooperative accused of embezzling depositors’ money through dubious lending and insider deals; DPO/CIAA actions followed.
officialInvolved: Cooperative promoters and managers

title: Swarnalakshmi Cooperative Fraud (Butwal)
description: Cooperative in Butwal accused of swindling depositors via unauthorized loans and fund diversion; arrests and investigations reported.
officialInvolved: Promoters/officials of Swarnalakshmi Cooperative

title: Patanjali (Ayodhyapuri) Land Scam
description: CIAA filed a large corruption case alleging irregular transfer/lease of public land to Patanjali-linked entities; former PM Madhav Kumar Nepal and others charged.
officialInvolved: Former PM Madhav Kumar Nepal; former ministers; officials; bank executives

title: Teramocs/National Payment Switch Procurement (NTA)
description: CIAA chargesheeted ex-minister Mohan Basnet and NTA officials over alleged irregularities in awarding Teramocs a multi-billion-rupee telecom project.
officialInvolved: Mohan Bahadur Basnet; senior NTA officials

title: Nepal Tourism Board Corruption (Legacy)
description: Allegations of embezzlement and irregular expenses at NTB in the early 2000s led to arrests and reforms after a series of exposés.
officialInvolved: Then NTB officials and board members

title: National Trading Limited Sugar Import Irregularities
description: State trading firm’s sugar import and auction processes drew allegations of collusion and losses to the state.
officialInvolved: National Trading Limited officials and private bidders

title: Customs Officials Implicated in Gold Smuggling (2023)
description: Following a major 2023 seizure, multiple customs staffers were arrested for alleged facilitation of smuggling rings using TIA.
officialInvolved: Customs staff including senior officers (as reported)

title: Illegal Offshore Investments by Nepali Businesspersons
description: Investigations revealed Nepalis investing in offshore companies to evade taxes and launder wealth, contravening Nepali law.
officialInvolved: Multiple businesspersons (as identified by CIJ Nepal investigation)

title: Nationwide Cooperative Scam Probe (2023)
description: Government formed a high-level committee to investigate a wave of cooperative frauds across Nepal after depositors’ complaints surged.
officialInvolved: Various cooperative promoters; government probe committee

title: 2019 DRI Case on Fake VAT Bill Network
description: DRI filed a Kathmandu District Court case against 24 individuals accused of evading Rs 1.75 billion via fake VAT bills.
officialInvolved: 24 individuals named by DRI

title: Pajero Tax-Exempt Vehicle Scandal (1990s)
description: Lawmakers exploited duty-free vehicle quotas to import luxury SUVs like Pajeros, triggering a major public outcry and reforms.
officialInvolved: Multiple MPs and officials of the era
